'''Radiant Spincrystal 135''' is an item used in any [[Furnishing]] of the [[Euphonium Unbound]] series to unlock the [[Soundtrack]] ''[[Until the Morning After]]'' in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

It is located in south-east of the [[Statue of The Seven]] in [[Ameyalco Waters]].
